paperback-writer.type.dsc: Output formats: PDF, HTML, PNG, JPEG. Multiple output formats are supported.
extension.paperback-writer.all: Output Markdown to HTML, PDF, PNG, JPEG
paperback-writer.isConvertOnSave.dsc: Enable Auto export on save. To apply the settings, you need to restart Visual Studio Code
paperback-writer.convertOnSaveExclude.ds: Excluded file name of exportOnSave option
paperback-writer.outputDirectory.dsc: Specify the directory to export to. If left empty, the file will be exported to the same location as the source file.
paperback-writer.outputDirectoryRelative: Interpret the export directory as a relative path
If set, the relative path specified in the export directory will be interpreted as relative to the location of that file.
paperback-writer.styles.dsc: List of paths for custom stylesheets (CSS) to be used.
paperback-writer.stylesRelativePathFile: Do not convert paths to custom styles
If set, incorporate the paths to the CSS files specified in custom styles as is (without converting to relative paths).
paperback-writer.executablePath.dsc: Path to a Chromium or Chrome executable to run instead of the bundled Chromium.
paperback-writer.scale.dsc: Scale of the page rendering. (pdf only)
paperback-writer.headerTemplate.dsc: pdf only. HTML template for the print header.
markdown-pdf.outputDirector.notExist: The output directory specified by the outputDirectory option does not exist.
